verses.text: \w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* not, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, for \w joy|strong="H1524"\w*, as \add other\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for thou hast gone a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* from thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou hast \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* a \w reward|strong="H0868"\w* upon every \w cornfloor|strong="H1637"\w*.\f + \fr 9.1 \ft upon: or, in, etc\f*

The \w floor|strong="H1637"\w* and the \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w* shall not \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them, and the new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H3584"\w* in her.\f + \fr 9.2 \ft winepress: or, winefat\f*

They shall not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; but \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add things\add* in \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

They shall not \w offer|strong="H5258"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \add offerings\add* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, neither shall they be \w pleasing|strong="H6149"\w* unto him: their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \add shall be\add* unto them as the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w mourners|strong="H0205"\w*; all that \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof shall be \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w*: for their \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* for their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

What will ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w solemn|strong="H4150"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

For, lo, they are \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* because of \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w*: \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall gather them \w up|strong="H6908"\w*, \w Memphis|strong="H4644"\w* shall \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* them: the \w pleasant|strong="H4261"\w* \add places\add* for their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w nettles|strong="H7057"\w* shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* them: \w thorns|strong="H2336"\w* \add shall be\add* in their \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft destruction: Heb. spoil\f*\f + \fr 9.6 \ft the…: or, their silver shall be desired, the nettle, etc.: Heb. the desire\f*

The \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w recompence|strong="H7966"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it:\add* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \add is\add* a \w fool|strong="H0191"\w*, the \w spiritual|strong="H7307"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* \w mad|strong="H7696"\w*, for the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w hatred|strong="H4895"\w*.\f + \fr 9.7 \ft spiritual…: Heb. man of the spirit\f*

The \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add was\add* with my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add but\add* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \add is\add* a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* of a \w fowler|strong="H3352"\w* in all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \add and\add* \w hatred|strong="H4895"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 9.8 \ft in the: or, against the\f*

They have \w deeply|strong="H6009"\w* \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* \add themselves\add*, as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*: \add therefore\add* he will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, he will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* like \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* as the \w firstripe|strong="H1063"\w* in the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* at her first \w time|strong="H7225"\w*: \add but\add* they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Baal-peor|strong="H1187"\w*, and \w separated|strong="H5144"\w* themselves unto \add that\add* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*; and \add their\add* \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* were according as they \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*.

\add As for\add* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, their \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* shall fly \w away|strong="H5774"\w* like a \w bird|strong="H5775"\w*, from the \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, and from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, and from the \w conception|strong="H2032"\w*.

Though they bring \w up|strong="H1431"\w* their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, yet will I \w bereave|strong="H7921"\w* them, \add that there shall\add* not \add be\add* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add left:\add* yea, \w woe|strong="H0188"\w* also to them when I \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from them!

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, as I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, \add is\add* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* in a pleasant \w place|strong="H5116"\w*: but \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* to the \w murderer|strong="H2026"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* them, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: what wilt thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w*? \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them a \w miscarrying|strong="H7921"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* and \w dry|strong="H6784"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*.\f + \fr 9.14 \ft miscarrying: Heb. that casteth the fruit\f*

All their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*: for there I \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* them: for the \w wickedness|strong="H7455"\w* of their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* I will drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* of mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, I will \w love|strong="H0160"\w* them no \w more|strong="H3254"\w*: all their \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \add are\add* \w revolters|strong="H5637"\w*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* is \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*, their \w root|strong="H8328"\w* is dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, they shall \w bear|strong="H6213"\w* no \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: yea, though they bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, yet will I \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* \add even\add* the \w beloved|strong="H4261"\w* \add fruit\add* of their \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft the…: Heb. the desires\f*

My \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will cast them \w away|strong="H3988"\w*, because they did not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto him: and they shall be \w wanderers|strong="H5074"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
